name: Logitech M185 Wireless Mouse (Swift Gray)
description: The swift gray Logitech's M185 Wireless Mouse is an affordable, straightforward, comfortable mouse for use with your laptop or desktop computer. This mouse is designed to work with either your right or left-hand and features right and left-click buttons as well as a scroll wheel.

name: Logitech Signature M650 L Wireless Mouse (Graphite)
description: Work with precision and comfort with the versatile graphite colored Logitech Signature M650 L Wireless Mouse at your side. Designed to fit comfortably into large right hands, this full-size wireless mouse connects to your compatible laptop or tablet via its included Logi Bolt USB Type-A RF receiver or using Bluetooth technology. Meanwhile, its 2000 dpi advanced optical sensor provides smooth and accurate control. The Signature M650 L also features an adaptive Smart-Wheel that automatically switches between precise line-by-line scrolling to free spin mode with a flick of your finger to rapidly breeze through content. The primary and two programmable side buttons are enhanced with Logitech's SilentTouch technology, which can help you avoid disturbing your environment with mouse clicks or having them picked up during calls. With an ergonomic design and soft thumb area, you can stay productive for extended periods of time. The Logitech Signature M650 L is rated to last for about two years using a single battery, depending on use. It is also compatible with Windows 10, macOS 10.10, Chrome OS, Linux, Android 8, and iPadOS 13.4 or later.

name: Logitech M240 Silent Wireless Mouse (Graphite)
description: Stay productive from almost anywhere while freeing desktop space with the M240 Silent Wireless Mouse from Logitech. Available in graphite, this ambidextrous Bluetooth mouse features a travel-friendly slim design that's small enough to quickly toss into a bag before heading out. At the same time, its contoured design follows the natural curve of your hand for long-lasting comfort. The exceptionally quiet buttons help to keep you focused by eliminating distracting clicking noise.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse (Black)
description: Stay comfortable and productive with the black Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse by your side. Updated with an 8000 dpi Darkfield optical sensor, this versatile mouse is designed to provide precise tracking on almost any surface, including glass. At the same time, its Quiet Click buttons provide a satisfying feel while producing 90% less noise than the original MX Master, and the MagSpeed scroll wheel provides fast yet precise scrolling at up to 1000 lines per second. The ergonomic design fits most right hands and includes a convenient thumb rest area where you can quickly access buttons and a side scroll function. Enhance your workflow by using the Logi Options+ software for Windows and macOS to customize the MX Master 3S buttons with different functions.-

name: Logitech MX Master 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse (Space Gray)
description: Stay comfortable and productive with the space gray Logitech MX Master 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse by your side. Updated with an 8000 dpi Darkfield optical sensor, this versatile mouse is designed to provide precise tracking on almost any surface, including glass. At the same time, its Quiet Click buttons provide a satisfying feel while producing 90% less noise than the original MX Master, and the MagSpeed scroll wheel provides fast yet precise scrolling at up to 1000 lines per second. The ergonomic design fits most right hands and includes a convenient thumb rest area where you can quickly access buttons and a side scroll function. Pre-defined macOS shortcuts and app-specific profiles in the Logi Options+ software help to streamline your workflow.-

name: Logitech MK540 Advanced Wireless Mouse and Keyboard Bundle
description: This MK540 Advanced Wireless Mouse and Keyboard Bundle from Logitech is a convenient solution for your computing needs. With wireless 2.4 GHz connectivity on both the keyboard and mouse, you won't have to worry about cable management or cords not being long enough. The keyboard features an integrated palm rest and adjustable feet for comfort while the mouse has a contoured, ambidextrous shape and soft rubber grips. Moreover, the spill-resistant keyboard features convenient and essential hotkeys for quick access to frequently used functions such as volume adjustments. Simply plug in the included Unifying USB receiver and you're all set. Both the keyboard and mouse use AA batteries and can last up to 36 and 18 months of use, respectively.

name: Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Combo
description: Keep your desktop clear of cable clutter while enjoying flexibility and comfort with the compact Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo. With its strong 2.4 GHz RF connection, you can operate this full-size keyboard and 3-button optical mouse combo from up to 30' away from the included USB Type-A wireless receiver, making it ideal for presentations, teaching, and environments with limited desktop space. Additionally, the height-adjustable ergonomic keyboard has a spill-resistant design and durable keys that help to ensure smooth typing experiences over the long term. Its easy to reach media keys allow you to quickly control video and music playback without interrupting your workflow. Best of all, the keyboard is designed to operate for up to 3 years using two AAA batteries while the mouse can stay powered for up to one year with one AA battery, depending on use. Both devices have on/off switches to help get the most out of the batteries. The Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo is compatible with Windows 10/11 and Chrome OS devices.

name: Logitech M310 Wireless Mouse (Silver)
description: The Logitech M310 Wireless Mouse (Silver) is a convenient and stylish wireless mouse that is compatible with Windows, Mac, and Chrome systems. It uses a USB nano transceiver that plugs into the USB port of your desktop or laptop for wireless connectivity and features an ambidextrous design for both left- and right-handed users. The M310 is powered by a single AA battery that can last for up to 12 months depending on use.

name: Logitech MX Anywhere 3S Wireless Mouse (Black)
description: Enhance your on-the-go workflow with the Logitech MX Anywhere 3S Wireless Mouse. Built to go everywhere you do, this black wireless Bluetooth mouse delivers exceptional precision with its 8000 dpi Darkfield sensor, which is designed to track on almost any surface, even glass. Six customizable Quiet Click buttons help to reduce noise distractions while the MagSpeed electromagnetic scroll wheel lets you breeze through content at up to 1000 lines per second in near silence. Additionally, the contoured, low-profile right-handed design makes the mouse easy to carry and use.

name: Logitech MK850 Performance Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo
description: Everything about Logitech MK850 Performance Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo has been built with comfort in mind. If you do a lot of typing, you'll enjoy the oversized, cushioned palm rest and curved keyframe. The full-sized keyboard has concave keys with a large strike area to help prevent unintentional keystrokes. Also, 3-position tilt legs let you angle the keyboard from flat, to 4- or 8-degrees for optimal alignment.

name: Logitech MX Ergo S Plus Wireless Trackball Mouse
description: Whether you’re a graphic designer, a programmer, or business professional, the MX Ergo S Plus Wireless Trackball Mouse from Logitech delivers comfort and advanced functionality for your everyday use. Designed for medium to large hands, this mouse features a soft rubber grip and an adjustable tilt angle to promote optimal forearm posture. The thumb-controlled trackball offers precise cursor control without the need to move your arm, while six customizable buttons and a four way scroll wheel provide extensive enhancements.

name: Logitech MX Keys S Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Combo Kit (Black)
description: Enhance your productivity with the black MX Keys S Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Combo Kit from Logitech. You can pair both with up to three Bluetooth devices or a single Logi Bolt USB-A receiver.

Available in off-white, this ambidextrous Bluetooth mouse features a travel-friendly slim design that's small enough to quickly toss into a bag before heading out. At the same time, its contoured design follows the natural curve of your hand for long-lasting comfort. The exceptionally quiet buttons help to keep you focused by eliminating distracting clicking noise.

name: Logitech MX ERGO Plus Wireless Trackball Mouse
description: The MX ERGO Plus Wireless Trackball Mouse from Logitech is an ergonomic mouse featuring a unique adjustable hinge, which adjusts up to 20°, so you can find a more natural and comfortable hand position that suits you. Furthermore, it's got a 512 to 2048 dpi optical sensor, a 4-way scroll wheel with a middle click, and a 500mAh built-in battery that can last up to four months depending on use. Connect this mouse to your system wirelessly using the included unifying receiver or via Bluetooth technology. It can also be paired and used with two systems at the same time thanks to Logitech FLOW technology.

name: Logitech MX Anywhere 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse (Space Gray)
description: Enhance your on-the-go workflow with the Logitech MX Anywhere 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse. Built to go everywhere you do, this space gray wireless Bluetooth mouse delivers exceptional precision with its 8000 dpi Darkfield sensor, which is designed to track on almost any surface, even glass. Six customizable Quiet Click buttons help to reduce noise distractions while the MagSpeed electromagnetic scroll wheel lets you breeze through content at up to 1000 lines per second in near silence. Additionally, the contoured, low-profile right-handed design makes the mouse easy to carry and use.

name: Logitech M310 Wireless Mouse (Blue)
description: The Logitech M310 Wireless Mouse (Blue) is a convenient and stylish wireless mouse that is compatible with Windows, Mac, and Chrome systems. It uses a USB nano transceiver that plugs into the USB port of your desktop or laptop for wireless connectivity and features an ambidextrous design for both left- and right-handed users. The M310 is powered by a single AA battery that can last for up to 12 months depending on use.

name: Logitech MX Anywhere 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse (Pale Gray)
description: Enhance your on-the-go workflow with the Logitech MX Anywhere 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse. Built to go everywhere you do, this pale gray wireless Bluetooth mouse delivers exceptional precision with its 8000 dpi Darkfield sensor, which is designed to track on almost any surface, even glass. Six customizable Quiet Click buttons help to reduce noise distractions while the MagSpeed electromagnetic scroll wheel lets you breeze through content at up to 1000 lines per second in near silence. Additionally, the contoured, low-profile right-handed design makes the mouse easy to carry and use.

name: Logitech M185 Wireless Mouse (Swift Gray)
description: The swift gray Logitech's M185 Wireless Mouse is an affordable, straightforward, comfortable mouse for use with your laptop or desktop computer. This mouse is designed to work with either your right or left-hand and features right and left-click buttons as well as a scroll wheel.

name: Logitech M705 Marathon Mouse
description:
The Logitech M705 Marathon Mouse is a wireless mouse that affords comfortable, reliable control over your Mac or Windows-based desktop, notebook or netbook computer. It employs a USB receiver and laser tracking technology for precise, smooth tracking on just about any surface.

This mouse offers a fast scrolling wheel and two buttons to allow you to navigate through documents and websites. Its sculpted, right-handed design allows for a natural hand position for comfortable everyday use. The Marathon Mouse is powered by two AA batteries that boast an estimated battery life of three years, depending on usage.

name: Logitech Signature M650 L Wireless Mouse (Graphite)
description: Work with precision and comfort with the versatile graphite colored Logitech Signature M650 L Wireless Mouse at your side. Designed to fit comfortably into large right hands, this full-size wireless mouse connects to your compatible laptop or tablet via its included Logi Bolt USB Type-A RF receiver or using Bluetooth technology. Meanwhile, its 2000 dpi advanced optical sensor provides smooth and accurate control. The Signature M650 L also features an adaptive Smart-Wheel that automatically switches between precise line-by-line scrolling to free spin mode with a flick of your finger to rapidly breeze through content. The primary and two programmable side buttons are enhanced with Logitech's SilentTouch technology, which can help you avoid disturbing your environment with mouse clicks or having them picked up during calls. With an ergonomic design and soft thumb area, you can stay productive for extended periods of time. The Logitech Signature M650 L is rated to last for about two years using a single battery, depending on use. It is also compatible with Windows 10, macOS 10.10, Chrome OS, Linux, Android 8, and iPadOS 13.4 or later.

name: Logitech M240 Silent Wireless Mouse (Graphite)
description: Stay productive from almost anywhere while freeing desktop space with the M240 Silent Wireless Mouse from Logitech. Available in graphite, this ambidextrous Bluetooth mouse features a travel-friendly slim design that's small enough to quickly toss into a bag before heading out. At the same time, its contoured design follows the natural curve of your hand for long-lasting comfort. The exceptionally quiet buttons help to keep you focused by eliminating distracting clicking noise.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse (Black)
description: Stay comfortable and productive with the black Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse by your side. Updated with an 8000 dpi Darkfield optical sensor, this versatile mouse is designed to provide precise tracking on almost any surface, including glass. At the same time, its Quiet Click buttons provide a satisfying feel while producing 90% less noise than the original MX Master, and the MagSpeed scroll wheel provides fast yet precise scrolling at up to 1000 lines per second. The ergonomic design fits most right hands and includes a convenient thumb rest area where you can quickly access buttons and a side scroll function. Enhance your workflow by using the Logi Options+ software for Windows and macOS to customize the MX Master 3S buttons with different functions.-

name: Logitech MX Master 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse (Space Gray)
description: Stay comfortable and productive with the space gray Logitech MX Master 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse by your side. Pre-defined macOS shortcuts and app-specific profiles in the Logi Options+ software help to streamline your workflow.-

name: Logitech MK540 Advanced Wireless Mouse and Keyboard Bundle
description: This MK540 Advanced Wireless Mouse and Keyboard Bundle from Logitech is a convenient solution for your computing needs. With wireless 2.4 GHz connectivity on both the keyboard and mouse, you won't have to worry about cable management or cords not being long enough. The keyboard features an integrated palm rest and adjustable feet for comfort while the mouse has a contoured, ambidextrous shape and soft rubber grips. Moreover, the spill-resistant keyboard features convenient and essential hotkeys for quick access to frequently used functions such as volume adjustments. Simply plug in the included Unifying USB receiver and you're all set. Both the keyboard and mouse use AA batteries and can last up to 36 and 18 months of use, respectively.

name: Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Combo
description: Keep your desktop clear of cable clutter while enjoying flexibility and comfort with the compact Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo. With its strong 2.4 GHz RF connection, you can operate this full-size keyboard and 3-button optical mouse combo from up to 30' away from the included USB Type-A wireless receiver, making it ideal for presentations, teaching, and environments with limited desktop space. Additionally, the height-adjustable ergonomic keyboard has a spill-resistant design and durable keys that help to ensure smooth typing experiences over the long term. Its easy to reach media keys allow you to quickly control video and music playback without interrupting your workflow. Best of all, the keyboard is designed to operate for up to 3 years using two AAA batteries while the mouse can stay powered for up to one year with one AA battery, depending on use. Both devices have on/off switches to help get the most out of the batteries. The Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo is compatible with Windows 10/11 and Chrome OS devices.

The primary and two programmable side buttons are enhanced with Logitech's SilentTouch technology, which can help you avoid disturbing your environment with mouse clicks or having them picked up during calls. It features 2.4 GHz wireless connectivity via its compact nano receiver that you can leave plugged-in to your system. For tracking, it utilizes a 1000 dpi optical sensor that offers precise movements on almost any surface. Depending on use, the M330 can last up to 24 months with a single AA battery.

name: Logitech M220 SILENT Wireless Mouse (Black)
description: Designed for users looking for a quiet and basic operation, the Logitech M220 SILENT Wireless Mouse delivers vast movement free of wires while retaining a strong and reliable connection whether you are Windows, macOS, Linux, or ChromeOS user.

name: Logitech Signature M650 L Wireless Mouse (Red)
description: Work with precision and comfort with the versatile red colored Logitech Signature M650 L Wireless Mouse at your side. Designed to fit comfortably into large right hands, this full-size wireless mouse connects to your compatible laptop or tablet via its included Logi Bolt USB Type-A RF receiver or using Bluetooth technology. Meanwhile, its 2000 dpi advanced optical sensor provides smooth and accurate control. The Signature M650 L also features an adaptive Smart-Wheel that automatically switches between precise line-by-line scrolling to free spin mode with a flick of your finger to rapidly breeze through content. The primary and two programmable side buttons are enhanced with Logitech's SilentTouch technology, which can help you avoid disturbing your environment with mouse clicks or having them picked up during calls. With an ergonomic design and soft thumb area, you can stay productive for extended periods of time. The Logitech Signature M650 L is rated to last for about two years using a single battery, depending on use. It is also compatible with Windows 10, macOS 10.10, Chrome OS, Linux, Android 8, and iPadOS 13.4 or later.

name: Logitech Lift for Mac Vertical Ergonomic Wireless Mouse (Off-White)
description: Designed for small to medium right hands, the Logitech Lift for Mac Vertical Ergonomic Wireless Mouse features a unique vertical shape, complete with a soft textured grip and a snug thumb rest. The 57° angle helps promote a natural posture in the forearm, allowing for day-long comfort and productivity. At your fingertips are four easy-to-reach customizable buttons, quiet clicks, and a SmartWheel for smooth, seamless scrolling.

name: Logitech G PRO X SUPERLIGHT Wireless Gaming Mouse (Black)
description: Designed for the competitive gamer, the G PRO X SUPERLIGHT Wireless Gaming Mouse from Logitech gives you smooth movement and advanced precision. Logitech's proprietary LIGHTSPEED pro-grade wireless technology provides 2.5 GHz wireless connectivity, giving you an enhanced untethered experience. Logitech's HERO 25K optical sensor gives you a 25,400 maximum dpi, 1,000 Hz report rate, and 1ms response time for enhanced control and accelerated pinpoint accuracy. The G PRO SUPERLIGHT wireless gaming mouse is designed for the right-handed user, features 5 programmable buttons, and has a battery life up to 70 hours.

name: Logitech G G305 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Mouse (Black)
description: Play your favorite PC games wirelessly with the black Logitech G305 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Mouse, thanks to its LIGHTSPEED wireless technology and USB nano receiver. The G305 can last up to 9 months on a single AA battery. It also has a lightweight design with a built-in storage for the USB nano receiver for easy transportation.

name: Logitech M240 Silent Wireless Mouse (Off-White)
description: Stay productive from almost anywhere while freeing desktop space with the M240 Silent Wireless Mouse from Logitech. Available in off-white, this ambidextrous Bluetooth mouse features a travel-friendly slim design that's small enough to quickly toss into a bag before heading out. At the same time, its contoured design follows the natural curve of your hand for long-lasting comfort. The exceptionally quiet buttons help to keep you focused by eliminating distracting clicking noise.

name: Logitech MX ERGO Plus Wireless Trackball Mouse
description: The MX ERGO Plus Wireless Trackball Mouse from Logitech is an ergonomic mouse featuring a unique adjustable hinge, which adjusts up to 20°, so you can find a more natural and comfortable hand position that suits you. Furthermore, it's got a 512 to 2048 dpi optical sensor, a 4-way scroll wheel with a middle click, and a 500mAh built-in battery that can last up to four months depending on use. Connect this mouse to your system wirelessly using the included unifying receiver or via Bluetooth technology. It can also be paired and used with two systems at the same time thanks to Logitech FLOW technology.

name: Logitech MX Anywhere 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse (Space Gray)
description: Enhance your on-the-go workflow with the Logitech MX Anywhere 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse. Built to go everywhere you do, this space gray wireless Bluetooth mouse delivers exceptional precision with its 8000 dpi Darkfield sensor, which is designed to track on almost any surface, even glass. Six customizable Quiet Click buttons help to reduce noise distractions while the MagSpeed electromagnetic scroll wheel lets you breeze through content at up to 1000 lines per second in near silence. Additionally, the contoured, low-profile right-handed design makes the mouse easy to carry and use.

name: Logitech M310 Wireless Mouse (Blue)
description: The Logitech M310 Wireless Mouse (Blue) is a convenient and stylish wireless mouse that is compatible with Windows, Mac, and Chrome systems. It uses a USB nano transceiver that plugs into the USB port of your desktop or laptop for wireless connectivity and features an ambidextrous design for both left- and right-handed users. The M310 is powered by a single AA battery that can last for up to 12 months depending on use.

name: Logitech MX Anywhere 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse (Pale Gray)
description: Enhance your on-the-go workflow with the Logitech MX Anywhere 3S for Mac Wireless Mouse. Built to go everywhere you do, this pale gray wireless Bluetooth mouse delivers exceptional precision with its 8000 dpi Darkfield sensor, which is designed to track on almost any surface, even glass. Six customizable Quiet Click buttons help to reduce noise distractions while the MagSpeed electromagnetic scroll wheel lets you breeze through content at up to 1000 lines per second in near silence. Additionally, the contoured, low-profile right-handed design makes the mouse easy to carry and use.
